abstract: Advertising column; two-year-old advertising agency Funworks hopes to disrupt industry with its idea of hosting collaborative workshops at which clients and copywriters are paired with sketch and improv performers; idea is meant to jump-start creativity and shorten amount of time it takes for campaign to be signed off on by client.

headline.print_headline: An Agency Enlists Comedians  to Get the Creative Juices Flowing
headline.main: Ad Agency Enlists Comedians to Get the Creative Juices Flowing

snippet: Funworks in San Francisco includes sketch and improv performers in its brainstorming process and invites clients to collaborate.
lead_paragraph: Funworks in San Francisco includes sketch and improv performers in its brainstorming process and invites clients to collaborate.
